title: Personal Portfolio Webpage
summary: Personal webpage and portfolio. Created using Typescript, React and Material UI.
description: Webpage created using Typescript, React and Material UI. Will be an expanding project and a way to learn Font-End development

title: New Hire Scheduling Automation
summary: Dashboard tracking new hire onboarding programs across EU fulfillment centers.
description: Provides a consolidated view of onboarding program metrics for EU warehouse new hires. Enables teams to monitor completion, calculate savings, and inform decisions based on training effectiveness.

title: M&A Deals Monitoring Tool
summary: Centralized tool to track M&A market activity using multiple financial data sources.
description: Aggregates data from Salesforce and Thomson Reuters Financial database to monitor merger and acquisition activity. Provides automated insights to support business development and strategy decisions.

title: AWS Cost Optimization
summary: Reduced AWS infrastructure costs for live data pipelines in operations.
description: Implemented optimizations on SQS, Lambda, and data ingestion pipelines to reduce operational costs by 57%, contributing to the EU fulfillment center cost-saving initiatives.
highlights: Reduced Lambda invocations by up to 83%
Lowered SQS message volume by up to 90%
Projected annual savings of $48,000 for ACES fleet

title: Employee Engagement Dashboard
summary: Improved onboarding experience for warehouse employees across EU fulfillment centers.
description: Developed a comprehensive system for scheduling, compliance tracking, and KPI monitoring of onboarding programs. Delivered measurable reductions in unexpected attrition and absences, while providing actionable insights to Learning & Development teams.
highlights: Reduced unexpected attrition by 846 basis points
Generated $5M+ in savings YTD 2024
First implementation of row-level security in dashboards

title: Permission Monitoring Dashboard
summary: Centralized dashboard for warehouse permissions and training compliance.
description: Built a scalable dashboard to monitor personnel permissions, training completion, and compliance across EU fulfillment centers. Enabled centralized cleaning of permission violations and reduced operational inefficiencies.
highlights: Identified and tackled 1.2M permission errors
Reduced total violations by 98% within 4 months
Achieved consistent 6-hour data refresh rate

title: Warehouse Throughput Optimization
summary: Live tool to reduce dock congestion and optimize container flow.
description: Developed a real-time recommendation system for dock management in EU fulfillment centers. Enabled proactive trailer scheduling, container positioning, and congestion reduction, improving operational safety and efficiency.
highlights: Implemented live dashboards for container and dock status
Used by ~1,000 unique users with 200,000+ API calls
Enhanced decision-making for peak operations

title: Training Effectiveness Dashboard
summary: Centralized platform to measure and improve training impact.
description: Consolidated multiple learning data sources into a single dashboard, providing metrics on learner satisfaction, knowledge retention, and skill application. Enabled targeted interventions and strategic decision-making for Learning & Development programs.
highlights: Tracked 74 unique users with 132 weekly accesses
Improved post-training assessment scores by 15%
Enabled data-driven coaching and curriculum improvements

title: Employee Language Optimization
summary: Enhanced onboarding for non-native language speakers.
description: Created a system to match instructors with associates based on language, shift, and process. Provided analytics to Learning Managers to optimize training allocation and improve onboarding efficiency.
highlights: Supported onboarding across all European fulfillment centers
Improved resource allocation and training planning
Enhanced associate experience for non-native speakers

title: Cross Functional Training
summary: Tool to track and optimize cross-training of warehouse associates.
description: Redesigned training system to track subprocess-level skills and validate competency through certifications. Prioritized workforce allocation based on proficiency and labor gaps, enabling operational flexibility and cost savings.
highlights: Identified 10K additional eligible employees
Contributed $20M+ in net cost avoidance
